Some ongoing projects that I am involved.

Live Coding Performances

Software Development for Sonification App

I am working in the IPSOS project, a web based platform for online data sonification of high energy physics that was created for educational outreach and workshops. It is a collaboration between the University of Birmingham, CERN, ITU/MIAM and the Birmingham Ensemble for Electroacoustic Research. Supporting website of IPSOS can be seen here.
